product_name: XSories X Project WiFi Pico Projector
long_description: The X-Project WiFi projector brings HD videos and images to life and lets you wirelessly share your memories directly from existing networks, SD cards or USB sticks with exceptional clarity.
short_description: The X-Project WiFi projector brings HD videos and images to life and lets you wirelessly share your memories directly from existing networks, SD cards or USB sticks with exceptional clarity.
